wiki.title: Encyclopedia
wiki.gen-stats-info: The following statistics are used for the creation of character sheets. Each value indicates the percentage probability of confirming each time the attribute is tested. These values also influence different moments in history. Each symbol corresponds to an attribute:
wiki.gen-stats-note: Note: Different weapons test different attributes. Make sure each character is equipped with the appropriate weapon
wiki.gen-stats-info2: The following attributes are used in the combat part and their value corresponds to the number of points in that attribute
wiki.dex-def: Aim the weapon carefully and carefully at the target
wiki.luck-def: Circumstance of being, favorable or adverse to something that happens
wiki.attack-def: Related to the damage dealt to the enemy per hit
wiki.warrior-def: He stands out for its strength. His punches in combat make him an epic and fierce fighter.
wiki.mage-def: He stands out for his intelligence. He can learn different types of magic that will be very useful in combat.
wiki.archer-def: He stands out for his skill. With his agile movements he knows how to take advantage of all combat situations.
wiki.types-char-note: Note: Once a character type has been chosen, the type cannot be changed again until the adventure ends.
wiki.weapons-info: On the weapon card (within inspect mode), you can see all the relevant information about the weapon you have selected.
wiki.weapons-1: 1- Contains the name of the weapon. Just above the name it will show whether the weapon is equipped or not.
wiki.weapons-2: 2- General attribute that the weapon uses to attack.
wiki.weapons-3: 3- Indicates the hand(s) with which the weapon is used (main without icon, secondary or two hands).
wiki.weapons-5: 5- States granted by having the weapon equipped.
wiki.combat-info: When combat begins, the user will have to choose between the different possible main actions. In addition to an attack, a character can use any item in his backpack.
wiki.combat-info2: When an attack is made, 3 dice are rolled (some skills can modify the number of dice) and the number of hits is counted. Each of these hits is multiplied by the player's damage and a attack value. At the same time as our player attacks, the enemy also rolls his dice and inflicts his attack.
wiki.combat-info3: Some combat skills have cooldown turns. After using these skills in combat, the player will have to wait for the cooldown turns that correspond to that skill.
wiki.combat-warning: Note: You cannot upgrade skills in the middle of combat. Make sure you prepare properly before battle.
wiki.combat-info4: During combat, enemy information is displayed at the top of the screen. Each enemy interface displays information about their health, attack, armor, strength, and any temporary combat status.
wiki.combat-note: Note: Armor values directly cancel out that same amount of physical damage received per attack.
wiki.combat-stats-note: Note: When a character is affected by one of these states, the corresponding icon will appear next to their name.
wiki.combat-stats-info: During combat, some attacks can modify character states. Below is a list of the different states:
wiki.burned-desc: This status can affect 1 to 4 turns and applies +4 damage per turn.
wiki.stuned-desc: When applied, prevents attacking on the next turn.
wiki.poisoned-desc: This status can affect ? turns and deals ? damage per turn.
wiki.skills-info: After you level up your character, your attack will increase by 1 and you will gain 1 skill point. Skill points can be spent in the skills menu (within the player interface, by clicking on your image or on its level)
wiki.skills-info2: There are 2 types of skills: passive and combat. Passive skills will permanently increase your player attributes. Combat skills give you new attacks to perform during battles.
wiki.skills-note: Note: Learning some complex skills requires several skill points but also grants a great benefit.
wiki.skills-info3: The cooldown of some attacks corresponds to the number of turns the player must wait to perform the same attack again.

cover.game-desc: It is a role-playing game in which decisions are made, mostly with texts, but also with a character, combats, events, and a story with an ending but with a very large tree of possibilities
cover.game-privacy: This application uses a database and allows you to save the game process with your Google account. This game only uses some basic personal data such as the user's email and name. You can check our policies by clicking on the following link.

contact-op.name: Name
contact-op.accept: I accept the terms of the
contact-op.presentation: I am VikingMorich, the developer of this video game. Write me to report any bugs, tell me about your experience, or suggest improvements for future updates. Thanks for playing this game, I hope you enjoy the experience.
contact-op.code200: Your email has sent successfully. Thanks
contact-op.error: All fields must be filled in correctly to contact the developer.

privacy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.p1: This Privacy Policy sets out the terms on which you use and protect the information that is provided by your users when using your website. UnnamedGame is committed to the security of its users' data. When we ask you to fill in the fields of personal information with which you can be identified, we do so by ensuring that it will only be used in accordance with the terms of this document. However this privacy policy may change over time or be updated so we recommend and emphasize that you continually review this page to ensure that you agree to these changes.
privacy.p2: This website may contain links to other sites that may be of interest to you. Once you click on these links and leave our page, we no longer have control over the site to which you are redirected and therefore we are not responsible for the terms or privacy or protection of your data on these other third party sites. . These sites are subject to their own privacy policies so it is recommended that you consult them to confirm that you agree to these.
privacy.p3: You may at any time restrict the collection or use of personal information provided to us. However, this company will not sell, assign or distribute personal information that is collected without your consent.
privacy.p4: As a user of the website, you declare that you have been informed of the conditions regarding the protection of personal data, you accept and consent to their processing by the owner in the manner and for the purposes indicated in this Privacy Policy.
privacy.p5: Tialaos reserves the right to modify this Privacy Policy to adapt it to new legislation or case law, as well as industry practices.
privacy.p6: Our App collects personal information, such as: name, Google image, language preference, as well as your email address.

charsel.title: Character selection
charsel.html-tooltip-mage: The mage dominates intelligence as the main statistic. </br> </br> He can learn different types of magic that will be </br> very useful in combat.
charsel.html-tooltip-war: The warrior dominates strength as the main statistic. </br> </br> His blows in combat make him </br> an epic and fierce fighter
charsel.html-tooltip-arc: The archer dominates dexterity as the main stat. </br> </br> With his agile movements he knows how to take advantage </br> of all combat situations.
charsel.alert: You have to select a character type to continue.

history-intro.start-text: Great souls have wills; the weak just desires. Some know me as Ragnaros... Everyone wants to know, but few pay the work it's worth. Go and find your way...

user-hud.Health-desc: Increase your max HP by 10 permanently
user-hud.HealthII-desc: Increase your max HP by 40 permanently
user-hud.Doublestrike-desc: Double the damage of the next attack
user-hud.Charge-desc: Attack the enemy, if you get the full </br>combo of hits, add stunned to the enemy
user-hud.Fireball-desc: Increase your üß† by 5 if you get </br>the full combo of hits add Burned to the enemy
user-hud.GhostAttack-desc: Remove the value of the first enemy's dice </br>when you use this attack
user-hud.Headshot-desc: Ignore enemy defense and +1 dice to roll
user-hud.Multishot-desc: Decrease your üëÅÔ∏è by 15 but triplicate your damage
user-hud.VampireArrow-desc: The amount of overkill to the enemy heals the player

questionary.talk: Answer all the questions to get a result...

q2.question: 2. Where would you like to travel?

q5.question: 5. What would you like to do on vacation?

q6.question: 6. What is your favorite movie genre?

q10.question: 10. Do you prefer a hot bath or massage?
q10.a4: None, I prefer other ways to relax üòè

pageDead.title: THE END
pageDead.desc: Since death is inevitable, let us forget it...

page1.slide1: I shit it... Ehhh you... Are you okay?
page1.slide2: I can't believe it, it seems like he's still breathing... AAAAAAH!!!
page1.slide4: But what happened dude, how did you do this?
page1.op3: I am the messiah, I have come to save you

page2.slide1: Oh sorry, I haven't introduced myself, am I X? A watchman from Island Y, I was smoking quietly in the tower and suddenly I started to see a dark purple swirl in the sky and I started to scratch...
page2.slide2: They would have sold me bad weed again... those bastards don't know who they're messing with... and suddenly there was a flash and I saw you fall from the sky to here nearby. I followed you and we just met. Are you okay?

page3.slide1: Great, let's start by leaving the sky as it was then :D
page3.op1: I do not know how to do that...

page11.slide1: Hahaha I guess. What is your name?

page10.slide1: Incredible after that blow... What is your name?

page8.slide1: Aaaah, please don't hurt me... I'll give you everything I have...
